mapper.sql: MCHT_ID, MCHT_NAME, MCHT_SIM_NAME, AREA_NO, MCHT_ADDR, MCHT_TYPE, MCHT_NAT, PLAT_FLAG, MCHT_SRC, MCHT_STATE, PAR_MCH_ID, CM_NO, CM_NAME, BL_NO, BL_TYPE, BL_EXP_TYPE, BL_EXP_DATE, MCC_GROUP_NO, MCC_NO, ICP_NO, WEB_SITE_ADDR, REG_DATE, APPLY_TIME, EXAM_TIME, EXAM_RESULT, EXAM_PS, CRT_TLR, OPEN_CLIENT_ID, UPD_TLR, UPD_TM, CRT_TM, MCHT_CLASS, MCHT_LIMIT_FOR_CUST, MCHT_DESC, REMARK, AUDIT_ID, SYNC_STATE, EXAM_REFUSE_REASON
mapper.insert: insert into MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP (MCHT_ID, MCHT_NAME, MCHT_SIM_NAME, AREA_NO, MCHT_ADDR, MCHT_TYPE, MCHT_NAT, PLAT_FLAG, MCHT_SRC, MCHT_STATE, PAR_MCH_ID, CM_NO, CM_NAME, BL_NO, BL_TYPE, BL_EXP_TYPE, BL_EXP_DATE, MCC_GROUP_NO, MCC_NO, ICP_NO, WEB_SITE_ADDR, REG_DATE, APPLY_TIME, EXAM_TIME, EXAM_RESULT, EXAM_PS, CRT_TLR, OPEN_CLIENT_ID, UPD_TLR, UPD_TM, CRT_TM, MCHT_CLASS, MCHT_LIMIT_FOR_CUST, MCHT_DESC, REMARK, AUDIT_ID, SYNC_STATE, EXAM_REFUSE_REASON) values (#{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtSimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mchtNat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{platFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mchtSrc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mchtState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parMchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{blExpType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{blExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mccGroupNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mccNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{icpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webSiteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{examTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{examResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{examPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openClientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mchtClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtLimitForCust,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mchtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{examRefuseReason,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP
MCHT_NAME = #{mchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCHT_SIM_NAME = #{mchtSimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_NO = #{areaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCHT_ADDR = #{mchtAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCHT_TYPE = #{mchtType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MCHT_NAT = #{mchtNat,jdbcType=CHAR},
PLAT_FLAG = #{platFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
MCHT_SRC = #{mchtSrc,jdbcType=CHAR},
MCHT_STATE = #{mchtState,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAR_MCH_ID = #{parMchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CM_NO = #{cmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CM_NAME = #{cmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BL_NO = #{blNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BL_TYPE = #{blType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BL_EXP_TYPE = #{blExpType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BL_EXP_DATE = #{blExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MCC_GROUP_NO = #{mccGroupNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
MCC_NO = #{mccNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
ICP_NO = #{icpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEB_SITE_ADDR = #{webSiteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_DATE = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXAM_TIME = #{examTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXAM_RESULT = #{examResult,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXAM_PS = #{examPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_TLR = #{crtTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_CLIENT_ID = #{openClientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_TLR = #{updTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_TM = #{updTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CRT_TM = #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MCHT_CLASS = #{mchtClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCHT_LIMIT_FOR_CUST = #{mchtLimitForCust,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MCHT_DESC = #{mchtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_ID = #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXAM_REFUSE_REASON = #{examRefuseReason,jdbcType=CHAR},
MCHT_EN_NAME = #{mchtEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP set MCHT_NAME = #{mchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHT_SIM_NAME = #{mchtSimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_NO = #{areaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHT_ADDR = #{mchtAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHT_TYPE = #{mchtType,jdbcType=CHAR}, MCHT_NAT = #{mchtNat,jdbcType=CHAR}, PLAT_FLAG = #{platFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, MCHT_SRC = #{mchtSrc,jdbcType=CHAR}, MCHT_STATE = #{mchtState,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAR_MCH_ID = #{parMchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CM_NO = #{cmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CM_NAME = #{cmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BL_NO = #{blNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BL_TYPE = #{blType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BL_EXP_TYPE = #{blExpType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BL_EXP_DATE = #{blExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MCC_GROUP_NO = #{mccGroupNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, MCC_NO = #{mccNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, ICP_NO = #{icpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEB_SITE_ADDR = #{webSiteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DATE = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXAM_TIME = #{examTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXAM_RESULT = #{examResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXAM_PS = #{examPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TLR = #{crtTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_CLIENT_ID = #{openClientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_TLR = #{updTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_TM = #{updTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CRT_TM = #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MCHT_CLASS = #{mchtClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHT_LIMIT_FOR_CUST = #{mchtLimitForCust,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MCHT_DESC = #{mchtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_ID = #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXAM_REFUSE_REASON = #{examRefuseReason,jdbcType=CHAR} where MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT MCHT_NAT FROM MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP WHERE MCHT_ID=#{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT PAR_MCH_ID FROM MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP WHERE PAR_MCH_ID=#{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT MCHT_TYPE FROM MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP WHERE MCHT_ID=#{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CRT_DATE_TIME crtDateTime,LAST_UPD_DATE_TIME lastUpdDateTime FROM PMP_AUDIT_INFO WHERE AUDIT_ID = (SELECT AUDIT_ID FROM MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP WHERE MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND AUDIT_TYPE IN ('01','02','03','04')

select MCHT_ID,MCHT_NAME,MCHT_SIM_NAME,MCHT_TYPE,MCHT_NAT,PAR_MCH_ID,EXAM_PS,EMAIL,aud.AUDIT_STATE EXAM_RESULT from ( select AUDIT_ID,MCHT_ID,MCHT_NAME,MCHT_SIM_NAME,MCHT_TYPE,MCHT_NAT,PAR_MCH_ID,EXAM_PS,EMAIL from MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP where MCHT_ID = #{platMerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR substr(MCHT_ID,0,15) in ( select MCHT_NO from MCHT_ORG_REL where ORG_ID = #{platMerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union select MCHT_NO from MCHT_ORG_REL_TEMP where ORG_ID = #{platMerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
) tmp inner join ( select * from PMP_AUDIT_STEP_INFO where audit_datet_ime like #{auditDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and audit_state in ('01','02','03') ) aud on tmp.audit_id = aud.audit_id

select tmp.MCHT_ID,tmp.MCHT_NAME,tmp.MCHT_SIM_NAME,tmp.MCHT_TYPE,tmp.MCHT_NAT,tmp.PAR_MCH_ID,tmp.EXAM_PS,tmp.EMAIL from ( select AUDIT_ID,MCHT_ID,MCHT_NAME,MCHT_SIM_NAME,MCHT_TYPE,MCHT_NAT,PAR_MCH_ID,EXAM_PS,EMAIL from MCHT_BASE_INFO_TEMP where MCHT_ID = #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) tmp inner join ( select * from PMP_AUDIT_INFO where LAST_UPD_DATE_TIME like #{auditDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and audit_state in ('01','02','03') ) aud on tmp.audit_id = aud.audit_id
